import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default function EmpTable() { const [employees,setEmployees]=useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:3006/emp/det").then((res)=>{setEmployees(res.data);console.log(res.data)}).catch((err)=>console.log(err)) },[]); function del(id){ if(window.confirm("are you sure want to delete")){ console.log("delet") } } return ( <>

Employees

{ employees.map((val)=>{ return( ); })}
Employee Name ID Department Designation Project Type Status Action
{val.name} {val.emp_id} {val.department} {val.designation} {val.project} {val.type} {val.status}
) }
